description: A toasty-warm, low-profile beanie made of a recycled wool/recycled nylon blend and lined with a cozy recycled fleece headband. Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory.
name: Coastal Cable Beanie

specs.value: Made from a cozy blend of recycled wool and nylon that's soft to the touch
Interior fleece headband provides extra warmth

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory, which means the people who made this product earned a premium for their labor
